data.name: Hyperland
data.detailed_description:
A cross-platform multiplayer game with one VR player and multiple PC players.

VR players dodge the attacks of PC players and attack using their throwing items, grenade launcher, hammers, etc., and PC players perform cooperative play to attack huge VR players.

PC players' means of attack consist of regular bombs and explosive bombs, and chemical bombs that temporarily blind the opponent. An electronic bomb that temporarily limits an opponent's movement, a painkiller bomb that removes all restrictions and restores energy.


The basic map terrain of the game is in the form of a cube, and in the future, we plan to allow users to create and distribute custom maps and to play the game in more diverse backgrounds.

  • Adopt simple game execution and play methods.
  • A game that all family members can play.
